mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATE_PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE, PUSER_NAME, BUSINESS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PRODUCT_WAY, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, RECEIPT, BUSINESS_NUM, RESIDENT_NUM, STATUS,PRODUCT_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT, RECEIVE_DELIVERY ) VALUES( SEQ_DOPRONO.NEXTVAL, #{productType}, #{puserName}, #{businessName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{productWay}, #{productAmount}, #{receipt}, #{businessNum}, #{residentNum}, 'Y', SYSDATE, #{categoryNo}, #{inquiryContent}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM DONATE_PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE, PUSER_NAME, BUSINESS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PRODUCT_WAY, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, RECEIPT, BUSINESS_NUM, RESIDENT_NUM, STATUS,PRODUCT_DATE, D.CATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT, RECEIVE_DELIVERY, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM DONATE_PRODUCT D INNER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY C ON D.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE PHONE = #{phone} AND RECEIVE_DELIVERY = 'N' AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE, PUSER_NAME, BUSINESS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, PRODUCT_WAY, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, RECEIPT, BUSINESS_NUM, RESIDENT_NUM, D.CATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_CONTENT FROM DONATE_PRODUCT D INNER JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY C ON D.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO WHERE PHONE = #{phone} AND RECEIVE_DELIVERY = 'N' AND PUSER_NAME = #{puserName} AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND RECEIVE_DELIVERY = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE DONATE_PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}, PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType}, PUSER_NAME = #{puserName}, BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, PRODUCT_WAY = #{productWay}, PRODUCT_AMOUNT = #{productAmount}, RECEIPT = #{receipt}, BUSINESS_NUM = #{businessNum}, RESIDENT_NUM = #{residentNum}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}, INQUIRY_CONTENT = #{inquiryContent} WHERE STATUS='Y' AND PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
